name: MBDA
membership: Aerospace and Defence Industries Association of Europe (ASD), Kangaroo Group, Europe & Défense
goal: MBDA is a global European leader in defence and security systems and related services
interests: Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Competition, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: CSDP, European Defence Action Plan, Preparatory Action on Defence Research, Defence Industrial Development Programme, European Defence Fund, European Defence Skills Partnership, Internal Market, Industrial Policy, REACH, Horizon 2020, Multi-annual Financial Framework
